00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary.h
00024  * @author Alan Williams
00025  * 
00026  * @brief  Class for accumulating some run statistics from a 
00027  *         genotyping run from the expression quant method
00028  * 
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef QUANTMETHODGTYPEEXPRCHIPSUMMARY_H
00032 #define QUANTMETHODGTYPEEXPRCHIPSUMMARY_H
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/ChipSummary.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/GenderCalls.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/QuantGTypeMethod.h"
00039 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00040 #include "chipstream/SummaryStats.h"
00041 //
00042 #include "stats/stats.h"
00043 #include "util/Err.h"
00044 #include "util/Util.h"
00045 //
00046 #include <cfloat>
00047 #include <iostream>
00048 #include <vector>
00049 //
00050 
00051 class QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary : public QuantMethodReport, public ChipSummary {
00052 
00053 public: 
00054 
00055   QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary(const std::string& analysisName);
00056 
00057   /** 
00058    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00059    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00060    * 
00061    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00062    * 
00063    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00064    */
00065   virtual bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) ;
00066 
00067   /** 
00068    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00069    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00070    * 
00071    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00072    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00073    * 
00074    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00075    */
00076   virtual bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00077               const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00078               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00079 
00080   /** 
00081    * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00082    * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00083    * 
00084    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00085    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00086    * 
00087    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00088    */
00089   virtual bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00090                      const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00091                      PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00092 
00093   /** 
00094    * Add the summary statistics for the raw intensity of probes in this probeset group.
00095    *  
00096    * @param psGroup - Probes to be added.
00097    * @param iMart - Data to get intensity from.
00098    */
00099   virtual void addIntensityValues(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, const IntensityMart &iMart);
00100   
00101   virtual void addAlleleSummary(QuantExprMethod &qMethod);
00102 
00103   virtual void addMadResiduals(QuantExprMethod &qMethod);
00104 
00105   /** 
00106    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00107    * results and clean up.
00108    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00109    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00110    */
00111   virtual bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod);
00112 
00113 private:
00114   /// The name of our analysis.
00115   std::string m_AnalysisName;
00116   // These objects are for keeping track of various summarization based statistics.
00117   /// Raw chip intensity.
00118   SummaryStats m_IntensitySummary;
00119   /// Allele summarization
00120   SummaryStats m_AlleleSummary;
00121   /// Residuals summaries. median absolute deviation
00122   SummaryStats m_MadResidualSummary;
00123   /// Deviation of alleles from mean. (euclidean distance)
00124   SummaryStats m_AbsDeviation; 
00125 
00126 };
00127 
00128 #endif /* QUANTMETHODGTYPEEXPRCHIPSUMMARY_H */
